name: Peace Lily
watering_notes: Water when about 5cm of soil have dried out
Once watering is necessary, leaves will start to droop
fertilizing_notes: Fertilize about once every 6 weeks during growth
Pause during winter and start again before spring
pruning_notes: Remove stem when flowers lose color and droop
When removing a stem, remove directly at the base
additional_notes: Will not bloom when conditions are too dark
Can be grown without any soil, only in water
